00062 #define AMP_amp_raw_semaphore_H

00065 
00066 #if defined(AMP_USE_POSIX_1003_1B_SEMAPHORES)
00067 #   include <semaphore.h>
00068 #elif defined(AMP_USE_LIBDISPATCH_SEMAPHORES)
00069 #   include <dispatch/dispatch.h>
00070 #   include <limits.h>
00071 #elif defined(AMP_USE_PTHREADS)
00072 #   include <pthread.h>
00073 #   include <limits.h>
00074 #elif defined(AMP_USE_WINTHREADS)
00075 #   define WIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN
00076 #   include <windows.h>
00077 #   include <limits.h>
00078 #else
00079 #   error Unsupported platform.
00080 #endif

00096 #if defined(AMP_USE_POSIX_1003_1B_SEMAPHORES)
00097     typedef unsigned int amp_raw_semaphore_counter_t;
00098 #elif defined(AMP_USE_LIBDISPATCH_SEMAPHORES)
00099     typedef long amp_raw_semaphore_counter_t;
00100 #elif defined(AMP_USE_PTHREADS)
00101     typedef unsigned int amp_raw_semaphore_counter_t;
00102 #elif defined(AMP_USE_WINTHREADS)
00103     typedef long amp_raw_semaphore_counter_t;
00104 #else
00105 #   error Unsupported platform.
00106 #endif
00107 
00117 #if defined(AMP_USE_POSIX_1003_1B_SEMAPHORES)
00118 #   define AMP_RAW_SEMAPHORE_COUNT_MAX ((amp_raw_semaphore_counter_t)(SEM_VALUE_MAX))
00119 #elif defined(AMP_USE_LIBDISPATCH_SEMAPHORES)
00120 #   define AMP_RAW_SEMAPHORE_COUNT_MAX ((amp_raw_semaphore_counter_t)(LONG_MAX))
00121 #elif defined(AMP_USE_PTHREADS)
00122 #   define AMP_RAW_SEMAPHORE_COUNT_MAX ((amp_raw_semaphore_counter_t)(LONG_MAX))
00123 #elif defined(AMP_USE_WINTHREADS)
00124 #   define AMP_RAW_SEMAPHORE_COUNT_MAX ((amp_raw_semaphore_counter_t)(LONG_MAX))
00125 #else
00126 #   error Unsupported platform.
00127 #endif
00128     
00129     
00136     struct amp_raw_semaphore_s {
00137 #if defined(AMP_USE_POSIX_1003_1B_SEMAPHORES)
00138         sem_t semaphore;
00139 #elif defined(AMP_USE_LIBDISPATCH_SEMAPHORES)
00140         dispatch_semaphore_t semaphore;
00141 #elif defined(AMP_USE_PTHREADS)
00142         pthread_mutex_t mutex;
00143         pthread_cond_t a_thread_can_pass;
00144         amp_semaphore_counter_t count;
00145 #elif defined(AMP_USE_WINTHREADS)
00146         HANDLE semaphore_handle;
00147 #else
00148 #   error Unsupported platform.
00149 #endif
00150     };
